name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: League of Legends Irelia Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into Irelia's graceful yet deadly world with stunning visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Harness the grace and power of Irelia with our League of Legends-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and elegant interface inspired by Irelia’s mastery of blades and serene poise.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the balance and precision of Irelia’s world.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Irelia-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Elevate your browsing experience with features as fluid and powerful as Irelia’s movements.
